page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: THE PEOPLE LIVING IN THIS BLOCK HAVE A WIDE VARIETY OF INTERESTS. THEY INCLUDE READING, WATCHING TELEVISION, LISTENING TO RADIO AND MUSIC, AND MAKING THEIR OWN MUSIC.WINE MAKING AND TASTING WHILST EXCHANGING SOCIAL VISITS IS AN ENJOYABLE PASTIME ALONG WITH MODEL PLANE MAKING, PAINTING AND PRESSED FLOWER WORK. MANY PEOPLE SPEND THEIR LEISURE TIME GARDENING AND SOME WORKING WITH WOOD, SPINNING WOOL AND DISCUSSING CHAPEL BUSINESS. WALKING, HORSE RIDING, PHOTOGRAPHY AND PHILOSOPHY AND OTHER RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES PURSUED WITHIN THE BLOCK. PEOPLE LIVING IN THIS AREA NEED TO MOVE OUT OF THE BLOCK TO ENJOY PLAYING DARTS, WHIST, MOTORING AND CARAVANNING HOLIDAYS. SOME GO TO ONE OF THE LOCAL PUBLIC HOUSES. THE ANNUAL NOVEMBER FIFTH BONFIRE CELEBRATION IS HELD IN MUTTON DINGLE.
